author: protolambda
content: <@!425567222635954178> exactly, attestations attest to 1 shard blob at a time, and do not require "chaining" of shard blobs (unlike the older more complex phase1 design with shard-transitions). Instead, the shard blob references the latest beacon-block-root (before the slot of the blob itself) to ensure shard-data users can pin what beacon state they are working with.
